title: Ticket #6803: pytest should have config editing and per-daemon on/off/restart
description: It would benefit cmd_now.run, and probably others in the future, if the pytest module provided a way to stop a daemon, edit the configuration, and restart the daemon. This shouldn't have to change the existing API or work-flow, but we'll want to be careful about the precise semantics of "edit the configuration"; regenerating from a new set of arguments and replacing the old configuration file(s) may be a good approach.
